text:
<|start_header_id|>user<|end_header_id|>

Translate to Korean: The fire control system integrates radar and targeting data.<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>assistant<|end_header_id|>

사격통제시스템은 레이더와 표적 데이터를 통합합니다.<|eot_id|>

<|start_header_id|>user<|end_header_id|>

Translate to Korean: Advanced fighter aircraft employ stealth technology.<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>assistant<|end_header_id|>

첨단 전투기는 스텔스 기술을 활용합니다.<|eot_id|>

<|start_header_id|>user<|end_header_id|>

Translate to Korean: The guided missile system achieved target lock.<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>assistant<|end_header_id|>

유도탄 시스템이 표적 고정을 달성했습니다.<|eot_id|>

<|start_header_id|>user<|end_header_id|>

Translate to Korean: Night vision devices enhance operational capability.<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>assistant<|end_header_id|>

야간투시경은 작전 능력을 향상시킵니다.<|eot_id|>
